item.title: Book :The Diary of a CEO
item.description: Intersting takeaways This book covers.. Here are my interesting bits from this book Pillar 4 - The Team Leverage the Power of Progress , Superpower of small wins How to create prospective progress in teams - steps Creating meaning Setting Clear anf Actionable Goals Providing Autonomy Removing Friction Broadcasting Progress (Celebrate) “The most professionally rewarding feeling inn the world is sense of Forward motion” Ask Who NOT How - Delegate
